scripts.contracts:deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network sepolia
scripts.real-agents: echo 'Starting Real AI Agents page...' && pnpm dev
scripts.full-setup: pnpm install && pnpm eliza:install && pnpm contracts:install
scripts.clean: rm -rf .next && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf eliza-agent/node_modules && rm -rf contracts/node_modules
scripts.check-env: node -e "console.log('Checking environment...'); console.log('OPENAI_API_KEY:', process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY ? 'Set' : 'Not set'); console.log('NODE_ENV:', process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development');"
scripts.help: echo 'Available scripts:' && echo '  dev - Start Next.js development server' && echo '  eliza:start - Start ElizaOS local server' && echo '  eliza:install - Install ElizaOS dependencies' && echo '  contracts:install - Install smart contract dependencies' && echo '  contracts:compile - Compile smart contracts' && echo '  contracts:deploy - Deploy contracts to Sepolia' && echo '  demo - Start demo mode' && echo '  real-agents - Start Real AI Agents page' && echo '  support-dashboard - Start Support Dashboard' && echo '  full-setup - Install all dependencies' && echo '  start-all - Start both Next.js and ElizaOS' && echo '  check-env - Check environment variables' && echo '  help - Show this help message'
